Investment_StatementObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Investment_StatementObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Investment_StatementObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Investment Statement

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Default the Person making the comment to the processing person if not submitted via the web service.

validation.validation: Cancel Accounting Date can not be included when submitting an Investment Statement.

Investment_Statement_Data.description: Reference to the Investment Profile that sent the Investment Statement
The Investment Statement covers activity starting on this date.

validation.validation: Your latest Investment Statement Date is [latest statement date]. Because your new investment statement must be in sequential order, enter [beginning statement date] for the Investment Statement Beginning Date.

Investment_Statement_Data.description: The Investment Statement covers activity until this date.

validation.validation: Cannot perform investment pool transaction for the future. The Transaction Date must be on or before the current date.
The Investment Statement Date cannot be set prior to the latest recorded Investment Pool Valuation Fiscal Period End Date [latest fiscal period end date for investment pool from gift].

Investment_Statement_Data.description: The net activity amount including the Investment Statement activity.

Text attribute identifying Filename of the Attachment.

Boolean attribute identifying whether the Attachment is compressed.

validation.validation: If a file name is specified for a Financial Attachment, File Content and Content Type are required.

description: Element containing essential Investment Statement data

validation.validation: The sum of line amounts must equal the difference between the beginning and ending balance, [amount].
